emailInfo: We will never share your email address
bookingWIPText: In the meantime, send us an email or call us to enjoy our services on the Island of Montreal!
deliveryServiceOpt1: No need, I will come to pick it up
deliveryServiceOpt2: No, I will pick up the machine at the same place where I buy the kegs (if Island of Montreal)
deliveryServiceOpt3: Yes on the Island of Montreal (Free)
deliveryServiceOpt4: Yes outside the Island of Montreal (additional fees apply)
bookingInfo: For beer kegs, we can send you a quote from our partner microbreweries, if you are interested please specify in the 'Other Details' section with as much information as possible about the event.
